title: Sage Reed’s Blood Orange & Toasted Walnut Brussels Sprouts
summary: Sage Reed’s Blood Orange & Toasted Walnut Brussels Sprouts is a gluten free and vegan recipe with 1 servings. One portion of this dish contains roughly 14g of protein, 53g of fat, and a total of 586 calories. For $2.93 per serving, this recipe covers 22% of your daily requirements of vitamins and minerals. 7 people found this recipe to be delicious and satisfying. A mixture of sprouts, blood orange juice, nama shoyu, and a handful of other ingredients are all it takes to make this recipe so delicious. From preparation to the plate, this recipe takes roughly 10 minutes. All things considered, we decided this recipe deserves a spoonacular score of 87%. This score is awesome. Similar recipes are Blood Orange Brussels Sprouts, Brussels Sprouts With Chestnuts & Sage, and Brussels Sprouts With Pancettan And Sage.
